actions.name: add_member_to_list
actions.description: Add a new subscriber to an audience or update existing subscriber

actions.name: add_note_to_subscriber
actions.description: Add a note to a subscriber in your Mailchimp audience.

actions.name: add_subscriber_to_tag
actions.description: Add a subscriber to a specific tag in your Mailchimp audience.

actions.name: create_audience
actions.description: Create a new audience (list) in your Mailchimp account

actions.name: find_campaign
actions.description: Search all campaigns for the specified query terms

actions.name: find_customer
actions.description: Find a customer by email address in a store

actions.name: find_subscriber
actions.description: Search for subscribers across all lists or within a specific list. This action provides comprehensive subscriber information including merge fields, interests, and activity data.

actions.name: find_tag
actions.description: Search for tags on a list by name

actions.name: get_campaign_report
actions.description: Get comprehensive report details for a specific sent campaign including opens, clicks, bounces, and performance metrics

actions.name: remove_subscriber_from_tag
actions.description: Remove a subscriber from a specific tag in your Mailchimp audience.

actions.name: unsubscribe_email
actions.description: Unsubscribe an email address from an audience

actions.name: update_member_in_list
actions.description: Update a member in an existing Mailchimp audience (list)

triggers.name: email_opened
triggers.description: Fires when a recipient opens a an email in a specific campaign

triggers.name: link_clicked
triggers.description: Fires when a recipient clicks a specified link in a campaign

triggers.name: new_campaign
triggers.description: Fires when a new campaign is created or sent

triggers.name: new_customer
triggers.description: Fires when a new customer is added to a connected store

triggers.name: new_order
triggers.description: Fires when a new order is created in the connected store

triggers.name: new_segment_tag_subscriber
triggers.description: Fires when a subscriber joins a specific segment or tag

triggers.name: subscribe
triggers.description: Fires when a new subscriber joins your Mailchimp audience. This trigger captures new subscriptions, opt-ins, and audience growth events with comprehensive subscriber information.

triggers.name: subscriber_updated
triggers.description: Fires when a subscriber profile is updated, including changes to merge fields, interests, or contact information. This trigger captures profile updates, new subscriptions, and subscriber modifications.

triggers.name: unsubscribe
triggers.description: Fires when a subscriber unsubscribes from your Mailchimp audience. This trigger captures unsubscribe events, opt-outs, and audience churn with comprehensive subscriber information for retention analysis.
